title: right click not registering in game

embed.description: Mouse clicks not registering since patch. Bug Report

body:
same issue as discussed in the link, but it basically felt that when you went to right click something it wouldn't register, or instead of click to attack it would make you walk to that location instead, also made for some very weird pathing, restarted computer and that fixed it but still a very weird issue.
(just wanted to inform riot it was happening on OCE as well)

Are you still getting this issue?

out of interest where is the setting to make all mouse clicks register? :P interesting addition to it, was just playing thresh (the only champion i dont smartcast all spells on) and when manually casting the left click wasnt registering either, and ive checked all settings anyway.

The clicks for the mouse are not normally configurable in League of Legends. The only thing you can really change with them is what happens when you press Ctrl, Alt or Shift with them.

I did a bit of research, and found this:

>Navigate to your config folder and open input (League of Legends/Config/input)
Add in the following lines of code:

>[GameEvents]
evtPlayerMoveClick=[Button 1]
evtPlayerSelectClick=[Button 2]

>If [GameEvents] already exists, just add the last two lines below it (That would be if you already have changed current keybindings inside of the game).

>There you go.
Right click is now left click, and vice versa.
So for all of you who want to left click attack move and right click select items, have at it!

Quoted from Riot Morgageddon about one year ago. [Source.](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3001735)

Before doing this though, make 100% it's not your mouse stuffing up. It's common in wireless mouse for that to happen.
not a big fan of changing the configuration ive been using on a stable system for the last 2 years,
